Microsoft Standalone Beta Package & SHA1 Hashes ​

All links below point to Microsoft's official Content Delivery Network (CDN).The links always provide the latest version available from Microsoft as of the last update. However, the version details listed below reflect the specific version available at the time this information was last updated. This information is pulled directly from Microsoft, so if no updates are available, it may show an older or current version.

IMPORTANT

This page is fully automated and updated through a script. To modify the content, the script itself must be updated. The information presented here is generated automatically based on the most recent data available from Microsoft. Please note that it may not always reflect complete accuracy. To access and edit the scripts, please visit the scripts folder here.
